name: MekEcks_DEMO_ver_negative_one
description:
Here I submit to you a flimsy demo of the game 'MekEcks'.

It has:

- 1 of 5 planned enemy types.
- (part of) 1 of 4 planned levels.
- 0 of 1 planned tutorial.
- 1 of 4 planned hero weapon types.
- 0 of 1 planned shield feature.
- 0 of 4 planned power ups.
- 1 of 3 planned vehicles.
- epic music by Marty (https://soundcloud.com/martleahy)

I hope to continue work on this project, however, time is not on my side.  It will be slow going.  Thanks for playing if you were brave enough to bother with the download!  :)  When I have something new, I will add an update below.  Cheers!
